Description:
After further review, we need to roll this back. We apologize for any inconvenience. Outlook Mobile now supports Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policy tips, helping users avoid accidental data leaks. When sensitive content is detected, users are alerted with inline tips or pop-ups, based on admin-configured rules. This update aligns DLP behavior across all Outlook clients for consistent compliance enforcement.
GA date: July CY2025
Title: Outlook: Data Loss Prevention (DLP) Policy Tips & Override for Outlook Mobile
